column1: Narrator : As CAPITAINE gets closer to the hen house, the birds inside are getting more and more agitated.
Choice : Let’ s go back to the farmer. (leave)
column2: Choice : Let’s try to catch one! (dex)

column9: PlayerSpeak : Looks like all the chicken are hidding now

column4: PlayerSpeak : Well at least that’s something...

column2: PlayerSpeak : Perfect, looks like the farmer didn’t see anything.

column1: Narrator : As CAPITAINE is running after one of the chickens, the farmer appears.
OtherSpeak : What the heck are you doing?!
OtherSpeak : You’ll pay for that chicken right now!

column2: Choice : Oh I'm so sorry, I really had no idea it was yours! (cha)

column1: OtherSpeak : I’ll cut your hands then !

column5: OtherSpeak : Wait you don’t even have enough money?!

column2: OtherSpeak : Well try to be careful next time! Now get lost!
column3: OtherSpeak : You reeeally think I'm some kind of idiot, don’t you?
column5: OtherSpeak : I am no fool if that’s what you think!
